#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL unsigned long long


const LL MOD  = 1e9 + 7;
#define maxn 1005

LL C[maxn][maxn],fac[maxn];
LL ans[maxn][maxn];
LL dp[maxn][maxn];

void pre()
{	fac[0] = 1;

	for(int i = 0;i<maxn;i++)
	{
		for(int j = 0;j<maxn;j++)
		{
			ans[i][j]= 0 ;
			C[i][j] = 0;
		}
	}
	for(int i=0;i<maxn;i++)
	{
		C[i][0] = 1; C[i][i] = 1;
		for(int j=1;j<i;j++)
		{	
			C[i][j] = (C[i-1][j-1] + C[i-1][j]);
			if(C[i][j] >= MOD)
				C[i][j] -= MOD;
		}
	}

	for(int i = 1;i<maxn;i++)
	{
		fac[i] = (fac[i-1]*i)%MOD;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<maxn;i++)
		ans[0][i] = 0;
	ans[0][0]=1;

	for(int i = 1;i<maxn;i++)
	{
		ans[i][i] = 1;
		for(int j=1;j<i;j++)
		{
			LL answer = 0;
			for(int k=j;k<=i;k++)
			{
				answer = (answer + ans[k-1][j-1] * C[i-1][k-1]%MOD * fac[i-k]%MOD);
				if(answer >= MOD)
					answer-=MOD;
			}

			ans[i][j] = answer;
		}
	}



}
LL power(LL a, LL b, LL c) {
	LL ret=1; 
	while(b) {
		if(b&1) {
			ret = (ret*a)%c;
		}
		a = (a*a)%c;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return ret;
}


int main() {
pre();
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
	int n,k;
	scanf("%d%d",&n , &k);
	printf("%lld\n",ans[n][k]);
}
return 0;
}
